about_the_game:
Unlock a facial graphic for Zhuge Liang from "Hyakumannin no Sangokushi."

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" or "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS," choose the added facial graphics to apply to the desired officer.
